mailjet_send_email.description:
Send email (text/HTML, tracking, custom IDs). This tool sends a single email through Mailjet's Send API v3.1. At least one of text_body or html_body must be provided. Args: params (SendEmailInput): Email parameters including: - to_email (str): Recipient email address - to_name (str, optional): Recipient display name - subject (str): Email subject line - text_body (str, optional): Plain text body - html_body (str, optional): HTML body - from_email (str, optional): Sender email - from_name (str, optional): Sender display name - reply_to (str, optional): Reply-to address - custom_id (str, optional): Custom tracking ID Returns: str: JSON response with message ID and status Examples: - Send simple email: to_email="user@example.com", subject="Hello", text_body="Hi!" - Send HTML email: to_email="user@example.com", subject="Newsletter", html_body="

News

"
